alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 9:32PM CDT until August 06 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Clinton County in south central Illinois... Central Washington County in south central Illinois... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Okawville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Centralia, Okawville, Albers, Wamac, Irvington, Ashley, New Memphis, Beaucoup, Hoyleton, Damiansville, Covington, Richview, Addieville, Radom, New Minden, Venedy, Huegely, and Frogtown. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 34 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Illinois.
